title: Seven cards placed on waivers - Now 8% off
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Seven cards placed on waivers - Now 8% off
posts.post_content:
1.  Jesse Tannehill        E90-1        SGC-A      "Blue Belt"     $23.00 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/e-party/8624/e90-1-tannehill[/IMG]

This card qualifies for 1 Kraken Number point.:eek:

2.  Leeford Tannehill      T207        SGC 30       Recruit back     $28.00 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t-party/61451/lee-tannehill-207[/IMG]

This card does not.

3.  Dave Shean       E101           SGC A         one of fifty        $42.00 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/e-party/19400/e101-shean[/IMG]

The first of three cards offered today for Shean back run collectors.

4.  Dave Shean      E92 Dockman     SGC 30     $44.00 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/e-party/8626/e92-dockman-shean[/IMG]

The second of three cards offered today for Shean back run collectors.

5.  Dave Shean       E102      PSA 2     one of 25 in this series   $49.00  shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/e-party/25695/e102-shean[/IMG]

The third of three Shean cards offered today.  If you are not a Shean collector, you could be.  

6.  Nick Maddox     E95        SGC 20      Philadelphia Caramel    $39.00

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/e-party/8621/e95-maddox[/IMG] 

7.  Red Murray      T205      BVG 3       Gold Borders;)        $39.00 SOLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10745/murray[/IMG]

centering acceptable to most discriminating collectors.

8.  Harry Howell    E92 Nadja    SGC 40   follow thru pose    $88 SOLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/e-party/38668/e92-nadja-howell-follow-thru[/IMG]

9.  Babe Ruth Not,   actually Bob Roth, his consonant cousin   M101-4   Sporting News reverse  SGC 70     $60 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/odds-ends/61450/roth-m101-4[/IMG]

The missing holders not shown on a couple of the scans are in fine shape.

Two interesting facts about Bob "Braggo" Roth...

- He is the only other player in Cleveland history to hit a walk-off inside-the-park HR (Tyler Naquin did it in 2016). 

- The Indians received him, 2 other plays, and cash in exchange for a guy named Shoeless Joe Jackson.

[quote name="KMayUSA6060" post=1789929]Two interesting facts about Bob "Braggo" Roth...

- He is the only other player in Cleveland history to hit a walk-off inside-the-park HR (Tyler Naquin did it in 2016). 

- The Indians received him, 2 other plays, and cash in exchange for a guy named Shoeless Joe Jackson.[/QUOTE]

Tough break for the Indians on that... makes you wonder how Jackson's career would've gone had he never been traded. Also, would be interesting to see a Jackson/Ruth trade. Would be perhaps the most significant trade of all time.

Now 8% off the price listed for a “limited” time.  You do the math or just guess and throw out a number.;)

Please note that if you exercise this option, 92% of the card will be shipped.:D
8% discount?!?  I'm not sure if I can even figure that out.  I thought 1/2 + 1/3 was 2/5, until I ended up with a bunch of extra pizza.  I didn't know we had to do math on this board...

[quote name="HercDriver" post=1790715]8% discount?!?  I'm not sure if I can even figure that out.  I thought 1/2 + 1/3 was 2/5, until I ended up with a bunch of extra pizza.  I didn't know we had to do math on this board...[/QUOTE]

It was 10% until i realized that all board participants do not have 10 fingers.:eek:

If I pay in pesos, which are 20:1, what would the prices be with the 8% discount?  Or would it be a 160% discount if paid in that currency?

Cheers,
Geno
